LanguageData.EIMS.ImportTooltip: Will overwrite the current mod-settings of the mod with the settings-file at {0}
LanguageData.EIMS.ImportTooltipInactive: No settings-file found to import from {0}
LanguageData.EIMS.ImportVerify: NOTE: This will overwrite the current mod-settings of the mod with the settings-file at {0}. Depending on the mod this may trigger errors or warning as the mod will be reloaded using these updated values. A restart may be required to fully apply the values. Continue?
LanguageData.EIMS.ImportAllVerify: NOTE: This will overwrite the current mod-settings of all mods with the settings-files at {0} if they are different. Depending on the mods this may trigger errors or warning as the mods will be reloaded using these updated values. A restart is probably required to fully apply the values. Continue?
LanguageData.EIMS.ExportTooltip: Will export a copy of the current settings to {0}
LanguageData.EIMS.ImportedSettings: Imported mod-settings for {0} from {1}, please reopen settings to verify.
LanguageData.EIMS.FailedToImport: Failed to import settings for {0} from {1}
LanguageData.EIMS.FailedToFindFile: Failed to import settings for {0} from {1}, file not found
LanguageData.EIMS.FailedToExport: Failed to export settings for {0} to {1}
LanguageData.EIMS.SaveLocationMissing: Cound not verify that the path exists, will not be able to save it
LanguageData.EIMS.SaveLocationTT: Where folder where mod-configs are exported to and read from
LanguageData.EIMS.ImportAllActive: Import existing mod-settings for all active-mods
LanguageData.EIMS.ImportedAllSettings: Imported {0} mod-settings (skipped {1} since they were identical) from {2} and reloaded the relevant mods, you might need to restart the game to apply them properly.
